price: Ẹ so yìgì fún àwọn ọkùnrin tí kò ní aya àti àwọn obìnrin tí kò ní ọkọ láààrin yín, (ẹ tún so yìgì) fún àwọn ẹni rere nínú àwọn ẹrúkùnrin yín àti àwọn ẹrúbìnrin yín. Tí wọ́n bá jẹ́ aláìní, Allāhu yóò rọ̀ wọ́n lọ́rọ̀ nínú ọlá Rẹ̀. Allāhu sì ni Olùgbààye, Onímọ̀.
arabic: وَأَنكِحُواْ ٱلۡأَيَٰمَىٰ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ مِنۡ عِبَادِكُمۡ وَإِمَآئِكُمۡۚ إِن يَكُونُواْ فُقَرَآءَ يُغۡنِهِمُ ٱللَّهُ مِن فَضۡلِهِۦۗ وَٱللَّهُ وَٰسِعٌ عَلِيمٞ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-ankiḥū al-ayāmā minkum wal-ṣāliḥīna min ʿibādikum wa-imāikum in yakūnū fuqarāa yugh'nihimu al-lahu min faḍlihi wal-lahu wāsiʿun ʿalīmun
